title: File
description: Abstract schema for submission of a file.

validation_error_detail.comment: Validation Error Detail can only be specified on files that did not pass validation.

schema_version.hidden comment: Bump the default in the subclasses.

content_md5sum.title: Content MD5sum
content_md5sum.description: The MD5sum of the uncompressed file.

content_type.title: Content Type
content_type.description: The type of content in the file.
content_type.comment: This property is overwritten by the subclasses to define specific enum values.

dbxrefs.title: External Resources
dbxrefs.description: Identifiers from external resources that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with IGVF file objects.
dbxrefs.comment: This property is overwritten by the subclasses to define specific enum values.

items.title: External identifier
items.description: Identifier from an external resource that may have 1-to-1 or 1-to-many relationships with IGVF file objects.

derived_from.title: Derived From
derived_from.description: The files participating as inputs into software to produce this output file.

items.comment: See file.json for a list of available identifiers.

file_format.title: File Format
file_format.description: The file format or extension of the file.
file_format.comment: This property is overwritten by the subclasses to define specific enum values.

file_format_specifications.title: File Format Specifications Documents
file_format_specifications.description: Document that further explains the file format.

items.comment: See document.json for a list of available identifiers.

file_set.title: File Set
file_set.description: The file set that this file belongs to.
file_set.comment: See file_set.json for a list of available identifiers.

file_size.title: File Size
file_size.comment: Do not submit. This value is calculated by the checkfiles script upon submission.

md5sum.title: MD5sum
md5sum.description: The md5sum of the file being transferred.

upload_status.title: Upload Status
upload_status.description: The upload/validation status of the file.

validation_error_detail.title: Validation Error Detail
validation_error_detail.description: Explanation of why the file failed the automated content checks.
